title: Not getting any chests anymore
body: Hi, since i bought myself some riot points and got alot chests, no matter what S rank i get i only get keys. So im not getting any chests since i bought some.

replies.body:
As Ace stated, there are a number of points you need to hit before you're eligible for a chest:

>- You aren't restricted from receiving loot due to negative behaviour in League
- You've not already earned a chest on that champion during this season
- You have a chest available to be earned (not sure? check your summoner profile and look for a gold lit-up chest in the upper right)
- You or someone in your premade group earn an S-, S, or S+ rating in the match you won

Visit our [Hextech Crafting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) for complete details on this system. Let me know if you have any questions.
did you already earn 4 chests this month ? or did you already get a chest on the champs you got an S on this time ?
